subject: Baseball
Hair
lead_paragraph: While falling to 0-2 with a loss to the Dodgers after a fine debut against the Yankees last week, Jacob deGrom has stood out for both his pitching ability and his flowing hair.
snippet: While falling to 0-2 with a loss to the Dodgers after a fine debut against the Yankees last week, Jacob deGrom has stood out for both his pitching ability and his flowing hair.
